IExecutionService

ISimulatedExecutionService
          The simulated execution service supplements a real execution service with a method to pass the input series used for the simulation.

ITradeStatsPoint
          Time series point specific to convey statistics about a trade
ITradingAgent
          Trading algorithm instance Instances are created by implementors of ITradingAgentFactory, and are operated by means of a hierarchy of handles.

ITradingAgentConfigurationManager

ITradingAgentExecution
          This interface represents a single execution of a configured, bound, trading algorithm
ITradingAgentExecutionManager
          Interface to manage the execution of an algorithm All operations to create, execute, manage the execution of a trading algorithm can be performed from this interface.
